entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
